trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_SEQ_00<tab>Chechezan, a Brass Blade in Horizon, has a task for an unoccupied adventurer.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_SEQ_01<tab>Chechezan has asked that you procure four bottles of mongrel blood. Find the creatures to the south of Horizon, and slay them for their vital fluids.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the requisite amount of mongrel blood. Seek out Nononzo along the Royal Allagan Sunway, and deliver to him the foul-smelling liquid.

TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_SEQ_03<tab>Nononzo explains that the stench of burning mongrel blood is perfect for warning away the creatures' natural enemies─which happen to include most other beastkin. Thanks to your aid, the roads are now a good deal safer for both Brass Blades and traveling merchants alike.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the mongrel blood to Nononzo.

TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_000<tab>Looking for a task to fill your <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, adventurer? I may have just the thing if you're not feeling squeamish.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_001<tab>Here's the job: I need you to draw four bottles' worth of blood from the mongrels that roam to the south of here.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_002<tab>Once you have enough, take the foul fluid to a Brass Blade by the name of Nononzo.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_003<tab>You should find him somewhere along the road out of Horizon, bemoaning his terrible fortune, no doubt. Happy hunting.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_010<tab>What do you want with me, then?
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_011<tab><sniff> Is this mongrel blood!? Thank the gods! Now I can finally head back to Horizon.

TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_012<tab>Mongrels are the natural enemy of most other predators, you see. Throw their thick blood onto a fire, and the resulting stench'll send beastkin fleeing for malms around.

TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_013<tab>Makes light work of our patrols...as long as we have a steady supply of the nasty stuff. And I'll wager you can guess which Brass Blade picked the short straw to kill mongrels this time around.
TEXT_SUBWIL092_00341_CHECHEZAN_014<tab>But thanks to you, I'm off to enjoy a hot meal and a tankard! May Thal's golden halls await you in the afterlife!
